title: The typeface from The Streets of San Francisco (1972)
content:
Hello,

I'd like to know what is the typeface that is used for the main titles of _The Streets of San Francisco_ (1972)?  
It looks inspired by the Herbert Bayer and Ed Benguiat. Find below a jpg file of the main titles artwork.  
Thanks in advance.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [1\_frisco-open.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317190610/http:/typophile.com/files/1_frisco-open.jpg) | 94.09 KB |
author: Garamondus
